duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive, count, and record shipment data into the system.
Match packing list information to actual packed merchandise and prepare packages for storage.
Record receiving data using computer and inspect stock items for wear and defects.
Deliver products, supplies, and equipment to designated areas and maintain work area.
Identify incorrect/short shipped items, notify supervisor, and operate forklift or other machinery if necessary.
Verify computations against physical count of stock and follow company safety policies and procedures.
May perform order layout and make changes to carriers or picking method.
Examine and inspect stock items for wear and defects.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or GED strongly preferred. Specialized skills training/certification may be required.
